description: This Java source file defines a REST controller for a Spring Boot application, providing basic endpoints such as a welcome message, API documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing basic endpoints for a Spring Boot application, including welcome message, documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message from the root endpoint.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to Swagger UI, preserving the original request scheme, host, and port.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns a simple application health status.
